full_text: Petar Fibres a Bees 2020/KER/176 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON MONDAY, THE O6TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 16TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.8541 OF 2019(G) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN SC 6/2017 OF ADDITIONAL SUB COURT, PALAKKAD CRIME NO.603/2015 OF Nenmara Police Station , Palakkad PETITIONERS/ACCUSED NOS.1 TO 4: 1 ABBAS, AGED 54 YEARS, S/O. ISMAIL, KALATHIL VEEDU, OLIPPARA, KAYARADI, NENMARA, PALAKKAD. 2 SALIM, AGED 31 YEARS, S/O. MOOSAKUTTY, KUNNANKAD VEEDU, ADIPERANDATHARA, KAYARADI, NENMARA, PALAKKAD. 3 SUBAIR, AGED 35 YEARS, S/O. ALIYAR, ADIPERANDATHARA, KAYARADI, NENMARA, PALAKKAD. 4 JALEEL, AGED 47 YEARS, S/O. ASSANAR, ADIPERANDATHARA, KAYARADI, NENMARA, PALAKKAD . BY ADV. SRI.V.A.JOHNSON (VARIKKAPPALLIL) RESPONDENTS/STATE AND DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031 2 MUHAMMED IBRAHIM, AGED 34 YEARS, S/O. SHAHUL HAMEED, Blea oa a [OF CRL.MC.NO. 8541 OF 2019 2 2020/KER/176 A.P STREET, NAVAKKODE, KODUVAYUR, PALAKKAD 678 505 R1 C.S.HRITHWIK-SR.G.P R2 BY ADV. UNNI SEBASTIAN KAPPEN THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 06.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Fane CRL.MC.NO. 8541 OF 2019 3 2020/KER/176 ORDER Dated this the 06 day of January, 2020 The petitioners are accused in S.C.No. 6/2017 on the file of the Additional Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 341, 324, 326, 435 and 308 read with Section 34 of the IPC. The only injured is the 2" respondent who has appeared through counsel and filed affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that he does not have any grievance. The injury sustained is not life threatening. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. A report has been filed by the Investigating Officer through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor to the effect. In the result, the Crl.MC is allowed and the entire proceedings as against the petitioners herein in S.C.No. 6/2017 on the file of the Additional Assistant Sessions Court, Palakkad and Crime.No.603/2015 of Nenmara Police Station stand quashed under Section 482 of the Cr.PC and the petitioner/accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE asm El: ro a CRL.MC.NO. 8541 OF 2019 4 2020/KER/176 APPENDIX EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 603/2015 OF NENMARA POLICE STATION, PALAKKAD WHICH IS NOW PENDING AS S.C NO. 6/2017 OF THE COURT OF ASSISTANT SESSIONS JUDGE (ADDITIONAL) , PALAKKAD . ANNEXURE B AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 1ST RESPONDENT HEREIN EVIDENCING THE AFORESAID SETTLEMENT. // True Copy// PA to Judge
